name: ThinkOptimal
tag_list: optimalresume-com, myoptimalcareer, careers, career-services, career-solutions, jobs, job-search, resumes, cover-letters, interview-practice, interview-preparation, portfolios, skills-assessments, video-resumes, career-tools, resume-search, resume-books
overview:
ThinkOptimal is the premier provider of career solutions and services for institutions and individuals. It provides job seekers, career services departments, and career advisors with tools that complement each phase of the job search process. Built on proprietary technology, our award-winning software has been nationally recognized for its outstanding design, ease-of-use, and robust performance.

We strive to deliver workflow-centered solutions that help our clients work smarter and more productively to advance their careers. Our passionate commitment to each customer’s career success drives our business, guides our product enhancements, and inspires our leadership.

Since our inception, we’ve worked with hundreds of professional career advisors and recruiters to better understand both the art and the science of connecting the right candidate to the right job opportunity. Our total solution approach to employment and career advancement has effectively assisted more than 1.5 million job seekers find career success since 2005.

Operating through OptimalResume.com and MyOptimalCareer, ThinkOptimal is the registered corporate trademark of OptimalResume.com, Inc.
